content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Connected with multiple pipes forming a fluid system.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) which is currently full and has copper-ore as input.

### Iron plate factory at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) which has coal as fuel and is producing iron plates.

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) set to produce automation science packs.
- Currently has no power and cannot create automation science packs due to missing resources.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from contains the item you want to extract. In the case of the copper plates, the furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0) did not have a valid entity containing copper plates.

### Errors when using assembling machines without power
- Check the power connections to the assembling machine. The assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) is not receiving electricity, which prevents it from operating.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. This is a common issue that can lead to failed actions.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
